name: ERTX 2080TI Mining clicker
description:
ERTX 2080TI: Mining clicker - an indie clicker, in which you are waited by a dizzying immersion in the world of mining and expensive video cards. You are waiting for the most powerful, available in the store, video card and endless earnings on the crypto currency, buying new components for your farm, and improving your business.

Features:
- Clicker
- Good graphics and music
- Endless gameplay
- Prorolling
- Equipment upgrade
